Instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease a baking dish.
Remove chicken from the marinade and discard the marinade. Place chicken on the preheated grill and cook for 6 to 8 minutes per side, or until the chicken is no longer pink and its juices run clear.
Remove chicken from the grill and let it rest for 5 to 10 minutes before serving.
